title: Auto-initialize airport cache on container startup
description: Airport cache (airports_cache.json) needs to be downloaded on first startup or when missing. Should automatically fetch OurAirports CSV and convert to JSON format during container initialization to prevent 'Airport not found' errors.

title: hot reload for UI
description: Implement hot reload/watch mode for UI development to automatically refresh when HTML/CSS/JS files change. Currently requires manual browser refresh after code changes.
close_reason: Implemented hot reload with uvicorn watching HTML/CSS/JS files and browser auto-refresh client. Server restarts on file changes and browser automatically reloads.
